doc.previous: In early May Human Rights Watch accused Saudi Arabia of using cluster munitions in Yemen The Saudi military acknowledged using CBU 105 bombs but it claimed they were only employed against armoured vehicles and not in population centers 175
doc.after: On 6 May coalition airstrikes targeted the Police Training Center in the Dhamar Governorate damaging nearby houses 176 unreliable source
